Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

15  KSIntScattering::KSIntScattering() :
16  fSplit( false ),
17  fDensity( NULL ),
18  fCalculator( NULL ),
19  fCalculators(),
20  fCrossSections(),
21  fEnhancement( 1. )
22  {
23  }

49  void KSIntScattering::CalculateAverageCrossSection(
50  const KSParticle &aTrajectoryInitialParticle,
51  const KSParticle &aTrajectoryFinalParticle,
52  double &anAverageCrossSection
53  )
54  {
55  double tInitialCrossSection;
56  double tFinalCrossSection;
57  anAverageCrossSection = 0;
58  for( unsigned int tIndex = 0; tIndex < fCalculators.size(); tIndex++ )
59  {
60  fCalculators.at( tIndex )->CalculateCrossSection( aTrajectoryInitialParticle, tInitialCrossSection);
61  fCalculators.at( tIndex )->CalculateCrossSection( aTrajectoryFinalParticle, tFinalCrossSection );
62  fCrossSections.at(tIndex) = 0.5 * ( tInitialCrossSection + tFinalCrossSection );
63  anAverageCrossSection += fCrossSections.at(tIndex);
64  }
65  }
66 
67 
68  void KSIntScattering::DiceCalculator( const double &anAverageCrossSection )
69  {
70  double tProbability = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., anAverageCrossSection );
71  for( unsigned int tIndex = 0; tIndex < fCalculators.size(); tIndex++ )
72  {
73  if(fCrossSections.at(tIndex) > 0)
74  {
75  tProbability -= fCrossSections.at( tIndex );
76  if( tProbability < 0. )
77  {
78  fCalculator = fCalculators.at( tIndex );
79  break;
80  }
81  } else
82  {
83  continue;
84  }
85  }
86  }
87 
88  void KSIntScattering::CalculateInteraction(
89  const KSTrajectory& aTrajectory,
90  const KSParticle& aTrajectoryInitialParticle,
91  const KSParticle& aTrajectoryFinalParticle,
92  const KThreeVector& /*aTrajectoryCenter*/,
93  const double& /*aTrajectoryRadius*/,
94  const double& aTrajectoryTimeStep,
95  KSParticle& anInteractionParticle,
96  double& aTimeStep,
97  bool& aFlag
98  )
99  {
100  intmsg_debug( "scattering interaction <" << this->GetName() << "> calculating interaction:" << eom );
101 
102  double tInitialSpeed = aTrajectoryInitialParticle.GetSpeed();
103  double tFinalSpeed = aTrajectoryFinalParticle.GetSpeed();
104  double tAverageSpeed = .5 * (tInitialSpeed + tFinalSpeed);
105 
106  intmsg_debug( " average speed: <" << tAverageSpeed << ">" << eom );
107 
108  double tInitialDensity = 0.;
109  fDensity->CalculateDensity( aTrajectoryInitialParticle, tInitialDensity );
110  double tFinalDensity = 0.;
111  fDensity->CalculateDensity( aTrajectoryFinalParticle, tFinalDensity );
112  double tAverageDensity = .5 * (tInitialDensity + tFinalDensity);
113 
114  intmsg_debug( " average density: <" << tAverageDensity << ">" << eom );
115 
116 
117  if ( tAverageDensity <= 0.0 )
118  {
119  aTimeStep = aTrajectoryTimeStep;
120  aFlag = false;
121  return;
122  }
123 
124  double tAverageTotalCrossSection = 0.;
125  CalculateAverageCrossSection( aTrajectoryInitialParticle, aTrajectoryFinalParticle, tAverageTotalCrossSection );
126 
127  intmsg_debug( " average cross section: <" << tAverageTotalCrossSection << ">" << eom );
128 
129  double tTime;
130  double tProbability;
131  double tDenominator = tAverageDensity * tAverageTotalCrossSection * tAverageSpeed * fEnhancement;
132  if( tDenominator > 0. )
133  {
134  tProbability = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform( 0., 1. );
135  tTime = -1. * log( 1. - tProbability ) / tDenominator;
136  }
137  else
138  {
139  tTime = numeric_limits< double >::max();
140  }
141 
142  intmsg_debug( " scattering time: <" << tTime << ">" << eom );
143 
144  if( tTime > aTrajectoryTimeStep )
145  {
146  fCalculator = NULL;
147 
148  anInteractionParticle = aTrajectoryFinalParticle;
149  aTimeStep = aTrajectoryTimeStep;
150  aFlag = false;
151 
152  intmsg_debug( " no scattering process occurred" << eom );
153  }
154  else
155  {
156  DiceCalculator( tAverageTotalCrossSection );
157 
158  anInteractionParticle = aTrajectoryInitialParticle;
159  aTrajectory.ExecuteTrajectory( tTime, anInteractionParticle );
160  aTimeStep = tTime;
161  aFlag = true;
162 
163  intmsg_debug( " scattering process <" << fCalculator->GetName() << "> may occur" << eom );
164  }
165 
166  return;
167  }
168 
169  void KSIntScattering::ExecuteInteraction( const KSParticle& anInteractionParticle, KSParticle& aFinalParticle, KSParticleQueue& aSecondaries ) const
170  {
171  if( fCalculator != NULL )
172  {
173  if( fSplit == true )
174  {
175  KSParticle* tSplitParticle = new KSParticle();
176  *tSplitParticle = aFinalParticle;
177 
178  fCalculator->ExecuteInteraction( anInteractionParticle, *tSplitParticle, aSecondaries );
179  aSecondaries.push_back( tSplitParticle );
180 
181  aFinalParticle.SetActive( false );
182  aFinalParticle.SetLabel( GetName() );
183  }
184  else
185  {
186  fCalculator->ExecuteInteraction( anInteractionParticle, aFinalParticle, aSecondaries );
187  }
188  }
189  else
190  {
191  aFinalParticle = anInteractionParticle;
192  }
193  return;
194  }
195 
196  void KSIntScattering::SetSplit( const bool& aSplit )
197  {
198  fSplit = aSplit;
199  return;
200  }
201  const bool& KSIntScattering::GetSplit() const
202  {
203  return fSplit;
204  }

206  void KSIntScattering::SetDensity( KSIntDensity* aDensityCalculator )
207  {
208  if( fDensity == NULL )
209  {
210  fDensity = aDensityCalculator;
211  return;
212  }
213  intmsg( eError ) << "cannot set density calculator <" << aDensityCalculator->GetName() << "> to scattering module <" << GetName() << ">" << eom;
214  return;
215  }
216  void KSIntScattering::ClearDensity( KSIntDensity* aDensityCalculator )
217  {
218  if( fDensity == aDensityCalculator )
219  {
220  fDensity = NULL;
221  return;
222  }
223  intmsg( eError ) << "cannot clear density calculator <" << aDensityCalculator->GetName() << "> from scattering module <" << GetName() << ">" << eom;
224  return;
225  }
226 
227  void KSIntScattering::AddCalculator( KSIntCalculator* aScatteringCalculator )
228  {
229  KSIntCalculator* tCalculator;
230  vector< KSIntCalculator* >::iterator tIt;
231  for( tIt = fCalculators.begin(); tIt != fCalculators.end(); tIt++ )
232  {
233  tCalculator = (*tIt);
234  if( tCalculator == aScatteringCalculator )
235  {
236  intmsg( eError ) << "could not add scattering calculator <" << aScatteringCalculator->GetName() << "> to scattering module <" << GetName() << ">" << eom;
237  return;
238  }
239  }
240  fCalculators.push_back( aScatteringCalculator );
241  fCrossSections.resize( fCalculators.size(), 0. );
242  intmsg_debug( "added scattering calculator <" << aScatteringCalculator->GetName() << "> to scattering module <" << GetName() << ">" << eom );
243  return;
244  }
245  void KSIntScattering::RemoveCalculator( KSIntCalculator* aScatteringCalculator )
246  {
247  KSIntCalculator* tCalculator;
248  vector< KSIntCalculator* >::iterator tIt;
249  for( tIt = fCalculators.begin(); tIt != fCalculators.end(); tIt++ )
250  {
251  tCalculator = (*tIt);
252  if( tCalculator == aScatteringCalculator )
253  {
254  fCalculators.erase( tIt );
255  fCrossSections.resize( fCalculators.size(), 0. );
256  intmsg_debug( "removed scattering calculator <" << aScatteringCalculator->GetName() << "> to scattering module <" << GetName() << ">" << eom );
257  return;
258  }
259  }
260  intmsg( eError ) << "could not remove scattering calculator <" << aScatteringCalculator->GetName() << "> to scattering module <" << GetName() << ">" << eom;
261  return;
262  }
263 
264  void KSIntScattering::SetEnhancement( double anEnhancement )
265  {
266  fEnhancement = anEnhancement;
267  }

269  void KSIntScattering::InitializeComponent()
270  {
271  KSIntCalculator* tCalculator;
272  vector< KSIntCalculator* >::iterator tIt;
273  for( tIt = fCalculators.begin(); tIt != fCalculators.end(); tIt++ )
274  {
275  tCalculator = (*tIt);
276  if( tCalculator != NULL )
277  {
278  tCalculator->Initialize();
279  }
280  }
281  if( fDensity != NULL )
282  {
283  fDensity->Initialize();
284  }
285  return;
286  }
287 
288  void KSIntScattering::DeinitializeComponent()
289  {
290  KSIntCalculator* tCalculator;
291  vector< KSIntCalculator* >::iterator tIt;
292  for( tIt = fCalculators.begin(); tIt != fCalculators.end(); tIt++ )
293  {
294  tCalculator = (*tIt);
295  if( tCalculator != NULL )
296  {
297  tCalculator->Deinitialize();
298  }
299  }
300  if( fDensity != NULL )
301  {
302  fDensity->Deinitialize();
303  }
304  return;
305  }

345  void KSIntScattering::PushUpdateComponent()
346  {

364  void KSIntScattering::PushDeupdateComponent()

383  STATICINT sKSIntScatteringDict = KSDictionary< KSIntScattering >::AddCommand( &KSIntScattering::AddCalculator, &KSIntScattering::RemoveCalculator, "add_calculator", "remove_calculator" )
384  + KSDictionary< KSIntScattering >::AddCommand( &KSIntScattering::SetDensity, &KSIntScattering::ClearDensity, "set_density", "clear_density" );
